title: 89/15/EEC: Commission Decision of 15 December 1988 on the importations of live animals and fresh meat from certain third countries
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 15 December 1988
on the importations of live animals and fresh meat from certain third countries
(89/15/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: As regards substances other than those mentioned in Article 2, the third countries on the list provided for in Article 3 of Directive 72/462/EEC shall continue to appear on that list, notwithstanding Article 2.

In view of the plans submitted pursuant to Article 7 of Directive 86/469/EEC and of the guarantees concerning substances having a thyrostatic, oestrogenic, androgenic or gestagenic effect, presented by the third countries on the list in the Annex hereto, the Member States shall continue to authorize imports of fresh meat and live animals from those countries under the conditions laid down in that Annex.
This Decision shall enter into force on 1 Janaury 1989. It shall be reviewed for the first time and possibly amended before 31 May 1989.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
